https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wrGpBDABkYWyMQgXDZiZN8VyWux.jpg Diamantes Negros tells the long journey undertaken by two young boys from Mali who arrive in Spain after being persuaded to pursue their dream of escaping from poverty by becoming professional football players. Black Diamonds
